mapper.select: SELECT ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(menu_id) FROM sys_role_menu srm WHERE srm.role_id = sr.role_id ) AS roleMenu, sr.role_id, sr.role_name, sr.dept_id, sr.roletype, sr.remark, sr.locked, sr.create_time, sd.dept_name FROM sys_role sr LEFT JOIN sys_dept sd ON sd.dept_id = sr.dept_id
